review_title: One of the nest Web Design offices in Thessaloniki, Greece

pros: Fun place to work, Friendly staff, Large Offices, Cool Clients, Located in the Center of the City, Very Good Portfolio, Able to learn new things, Ping Pong table in order to relax, Brainstorm room.
cons: Sometimes when on public transportation is difficult to reach because of traffic jam
